s: I thought I'd try this soft and dri and I like it... Unfortunately 1 of the 3 deodorants (came in a pack, great value) is defective, the swivel at the bottom turns but doesn't push the deodorant bar up to be used... What do I do?? Is it possible I can get 1 sent to replace the 1 defective? (Maybe the citrus scent) I don't want to return the other one I started using. ... Very happy to find a mainstream brand ...

t: Amazon.com : Soft & Dri Sparkling Citrus Aluminum Free Deodorant, 3 oz, Smooth and Clear Stick, pH Balancing Minerals, 3 pack : Beauty & Personal Care
s: Unfortunately, it’s no better than the other brands I’ve tried which leave me reapplying multiple times during the day. The ingredients are completely different even though it smells very similar. I’m disappointed and not sure what I’ll try next. But this is being returned. Definitely not worth $10 per container. But I gladly would have paid that much for the old one. ... Please bring back soft and dri ...
